title: Searching for new architecture and design jobs? Morphosis, Selldorf, CetraRuddy, and Stayner are hiring
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: Look below for Archinect's latest curated selection of architecture and design firms currently hiring on Archinect Jobs. This week's featured employer highlight includes openings in New York City and Los Angeles/Culver City. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore...
text: anchor Bill & Melinda Gates Hall at Cornell University by Morphosis Architects. Photo: Roland Halbe. Look below for Archinect's latest curated selection of architecture and design firms currently hiring on Archinect Jobs. This week's featured employer highlight includes openings in New York City and Los Angeles/Culver City. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools. Los Angeles-based firm Stayner Architects has two exciting positions available: a Project Architect with three to seven years of experience and proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, and Adobe Creative Suite; and a Director of Business Development and Marketing with at least three years of experience and proficiency with Microsoft Office and Adobe InDesign. The Project Architect must have experience working on DSA-reviewed projects, with specific experience with Los Angeles DSA office processes. The Director of Business Development and Marketing should have experience managing proposals and be familiar with client relationship management tools. Tamarindo by Stayner Architects.Architecture and interior design firm CetraRuddy is hiring for an Interior Designer and a Senior Interior Designer in New York City. The Interior Designer should have a minimum of six years of experience, have experience in educational, civic, and healthcare interior design, and be skilled with AutoCAD, SketchUp, and Adobe Creative Suite. The Senior Interior Designer should possess ten to twelve years of experience with a focus on educational, civic, or hospitality projects, and be proficient with Revit, AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and SketchUp. One Madison Park by CetraRuddy.Morphosis Architects is looking to add a Designer/Job Captain and a Senior Architect/Project Manager to its studio in Culver City. The Designer / Job Captain should have three to seven years of experience and be proficient with Revit, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite. The Senior Architect / Project Manager should have eight to ten years of experience with complex commercial or institutional projects, along with an expert-level proficiency with Revit and strong proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite. Orange County Museum of Art by Morphosis Architects.In New York City, Selldorf Architects seeks an Interior Designer with at least five to six years of experience and proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office Suite, and Studio Designer. The ideal candidate has strong business and management acumen, good problem-solving skills, the ability to work effectively within a collaborative team environment, and excellent oral and written communication skills. 200 Eleventh Avenue by Selldorf Architects.If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
• anchor

    Bill & Melinda Gates Hall at Cornell University by Morphosis Architects. Photo: Roland Halbe.

    Look below for Archinect's latest curated selection of architecture and design firms currently hiring on Archinect Jobs. This week's featured employer highlight includes openings in New York City and Los Angeles/Culver City.

    For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools.

    Los Angeles-based firm Stayner Architects has two exciting positions available: a Project Architect with three to seven years of experience and proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, and Adobe Creative Suite; and a Director of Business Development and Marketing with at least three years of experience and proficiency with Microsoft Office and Adobe InDesign. The Project Architect must have experience working on DSA-reviewed projects, with specific experience with Los Angeles DSA office processes. The Director of Business Development and Marketing should have experience managing proposals and be familiar with client relationship management tools.

    Architecture and interior design firm CetraRuddy is hiring for an Interior Designer and a Senior Interior Designer in New York City. The Interior Designer should have a minimum of six years of experience, have experience in educational, civic, and healthcare interior design, and be skilled with AutoCAD, SketchUp, and Adobe Creative Suite. The Senior Interior Designer should possess ten to twelve years of experience with a focus on educational, civic, or hospitality projects, and be proficient with Revit, AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and SketchUp.

    Morphosis Architects is looking to add a Designer/Job Captain and a Senior Architect/Project Manager to its studio in Culver City. The Designer / Job Captain should have three to seven years of experience and be proficient with Revit, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite. The Senior Architect / Project Manager should have eight to ten years of experience with complex commercial or institutional projects, along with an expert-level proficiency with Revit and strong proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite.

    In New York City, Selldorf Architects seeks an Interior Designer with at least five to six years of experience and proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office Suite, and Studio Designer. The ideal candidate has strong business and management acumen, good problem-solving skills, the ability to work effectively within a collaborative team environment, and excellent oral and written communication skills.

    If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
